reviewText:
This game is a Nostalgia overdrive, It was one of the first PC games I ever played.

Pros:
The gameplay is a mix between Point and Click and Mini-Games, which can be fairly fun.
It has pretty good voice acting. A couple of the actors from the first film returned for the game, and did a good job.

Cons:
The game is £7, but it only lasts about an hour, which really isn't worth it.
The lip-syncing and mouth animations are very choppy.

Conclusion:
If you are looking for a game to entertain you for a little while, this is a good game. It is a little expensive for a hour-long game, but overall, it is a charming game.

reviewText: In my entire speedrunning career I have never done better than I have in this game. I got a time of 52:00 flat. The trick was realizing that the underwater apples and pears were acutally NOT a part of the game but an effect from the LSD mashed potatos I ate for dinner. Never the less, this game is still a mastapiece. EA, Ubisoft, Activision could take a page out of Disney•Pixar's book and creat a work of art like this if they weren't big stupid poo poo heads.  I am the greatest there has ever been in Disney•Pixar's Finding Nemo's speedrunning community. If you wish to get an autograph from me message me and I will give you a copy. Slopnopski out!

reviewText:
Finding nemo is the most critically acclaimed animated film of all time and after many years people still talk about it today. So how does the game hold up compared to the film, well it's great and it comes close to being just as good as the film.

The Good: nostalgia(if you played it when you were younger),beautiful graphics, fun and easy gameplay, beautiful soundtrack, recreates the scenes from the film in a point and click adventure style game,easy to use interface,uses scenes from the film as cut scenes

The Bad: incredibly short(you can beat this game on the day you get it),high price for a game that only lasts less than an hour,no settings of any kind,bad facial animations

Rating: 9/10

Verdict: One of the best games based off an animated and if you are a fan of Finding Nemo and you never played this your missing out.
